title: Citadel Alum Jack Woodruff to Shutter Hedge Fund Candlestick
description: A former Citadel trader, Jack Woodruff, is winding down Candlestick Capital, the hedge fund he started in 2019. More than 2,800 hedge funds have closed since the start of 2020, exceeding the number of launches. Bloomberg's Nishant Kumar talked about the story on "Bloomberg Markets" with Scarlet Fu. (Source: Bloomberg)
